A Familiar User Experience' In announcing the online version, CEO Steve Ballmer said Dynamics CRM is an industry leader because it gives sales professionals a familiar user experience, enables greater collaboration, and streamlines processes and access to real-time data. The familiarity of the user experience is derived from the use of what Microsoft describes as a "next-generation native Microsoft Outlook client."

Dismissing rumours that Facebook is a threat to Google, he said the growth of the social network phenomenon has actually helped Google as people who used Facebook were also more frequent users of the search engine. Facebook usage is a net positive for us, he said. He denied the rumours that his retirement was because of increased competition from sites such as Facebook. Donald Rumsfeld takes particular offense at Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq. " Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody," Donald Rumsfeld writes. Nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The president did not lie. The vice president did not lie.( CIA Director President Bush ) Tenet did not lie. Condoleezza Rice did not lie. I did not lie.... The far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. Even so, Donald Rumsfeld - who does reveal that President Bush asked for Iraq invasion plans within days of 9/11- argues that removing Saddam Hussein was the right thing to do. to the company's headcount. Outgoing CEO Eric Schmidt announced today that Google intends to hire 1,000 people in Europe alone. Robin Wauters, Eric Schmidt said at the DLD( Digital Life Design) Conference in Germany, Our businesses are doing very well around the globe, and as a result I'm happy to announce we'll be adding 1,000 new employees in Europe and make some significant investments. Then Eric Schmidt continued, "Hundreds of these people will be located right here in our technology center in Munich." By comparison, Google only added 1,069 employees worldwide during the fourth quarter of 2010,
